body: It's like you actually think the artist will read this. My beloved ototo

Don't read any of these other comments. Only read mine. Your drawings are bad, but the story they tell is more than enough to make up for it. Drawing is something that can be improved upon, but deep emotional stories are something that you either have to experience or have the talent for. Knowing your feelings for your sibling, having them feel the same. Experiencing the love and lust that your relationship brings but being unable to take the next step. It is something that only those who have fully experienced such a situation can tell the quality of. Keep drawing these drawings. Keep writing these stories. It's rough around the edges but that didn't stop it from touching me in a way that no other doujin on this site has ever touched me before. Please don't quit. Please don't stop, and please don't listen to the naysayer's in this comment section. Your drawings are amazing, your story is amazing. You are amazing.
The art reminds me of the manga girl in SKET DANCE who draws crappy manga

As a reader, I gotta say, you’ve got some decent skill in art. But as a regular visitor on the site, you should probably do one of two things: Either you Leave the site and take your skill else where, or you take some notes on the better stuff here. Practice some more on facial expressions and shaping. See what makes people love some of the better stuff out their. There is plenty to learn from, and if this is what you want to do, take it VERY seriously.
Some of these comments are gold.
simple yet cool enough for me :P

Please, do yourself; and everyone else a favour, and stop making doujinshi.
